name: Sinister Zombies
description:
Our survival simulator will teach you how to resist the endless hordes of hungry zombies. Kill them in any way: kill, shoot, blow up.
To you in the help give a decent arsenal from the cold weapon to the bazooka and bombs, but remember that ammunition quickly ends, and new weapons will require experience and a certain rank. Kill as many dead as possible, get a new rank, earn money and experience. Then you can improve your arsenal, unlock new weapons, skills, character and gain access to two additional locations!

Welcome to the world of zombie apocalypse! Let’s disembowel to undead and flood the streets with blood!

Features:

- Exciting endless game play.
- 3 colorful locations of the post-apocalyptic world.
- 10 kinds of weapons.
- 3 special skills.
- An improvement system based on earning money, experience and rank.
- Cartoon graphics and fun animations.
- Slaughter soundtrack
- 500 easy achievements
